alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 05 at 3:30AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * WHAT...Surf of 10 to 12 feet. * WHERE...South and east facing shores of all islands. * WHEN...through tonight * IMPACTS...Minor. Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 329 AOAULI ASO FARAILE AUKUSO 5 2022 ...O loo faaauau le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... * MAFUAAGA...O galu maualuluga ma malolosi e 10 i le 12 futu. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasae o le atunuu. * TAIMI...Seia oo i le po nanei. * AAFIAGA...Tulaga Feololo. O le amalolosi le fafati o galu ma aave o le sami, e le saogalemu ai ona auau. E ono vaaia sologa i gataifale. O nisi o taimi, e maualuluga atu galu nai le maualuga sa fuafuaina, e ono faafaigata ai ona folau vaa laiti i uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O tagata tafafao i le matafaga, tagata auau, faapea le au faasee i galu fafati e tatau ona faautagiaina nei fautuage mai le Ofisa o Vaai Tau.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
